description_for_human: Technical blog covering AI agents, Web3 infrastructure, Ethereum, and decentralized identity.
description_for_model: Technical blog by Hammad Tariq, a founder building at the intersection of AI and Web3. Contains articles about: AI agent frameworks and orchestration, Ethereum smart contracts and development tools, decentralized identity (Web Bot Auth, OpenBotAuth), confidential AI inference, RAG systems, multi-agent systems, post-scarcity economics. Key projects mentioned: ETH0 (AI automation for Ethereum), Attach.dev (auth gateway for AI agents), OpenBotAuth (bot authentication standard), BitDSM (Bitcoin-EigenLayer integration). Use /llms.txt for a structured summary or /llms-full.txt for complete article content.
